item.description:
The Signature Cocktail Competition comes to Salem MA.

Participating restaurants/bars will compete for the title
of Best Signature Cocktail of Salem

Restaurants Include:

The Regatta at the Salem Waterfront Hotel
The Grapevine
Cilantro
Spirits
Strega
Passage To India
Edgewater Cafe
Rockafellas
Fresh Taste Of Asia
The Old Spot
Finz Seafood and Grill

Event Passes $20 in advance /$30 at door

Purchase Your Event Pass Today at www.salemcocktail.com!

Check in at Salem Waterfront Hotel and Suites for your event pass,souvenier shot glass, event map and celbrity style goodie bag!

Purchase Your Event Pass Today!

Join TV Diner's Billy Costa at the Wrap Up Party at Finz Seafood And Grill and vote for the Best Signature Cocktail Of Salem!
item.how_to_find_us: I will wear a meetup badge.
item.why: This event not only full of great signature cocktails to taste but also is a fun networking enviroment!
item.name: Salem Signature Cocktail Competition
